message: Let's start with a fair split, Bob. Your turn to decide!
I'll take the majority, you can have a small share
Let's meet in the middle, Bob. It's getting late!
You're running out of time, take a small share
Last chance, Bob! I'm not getting any younger!
You're almost out of time, I'm taking most of it
I'm not going down without a fight, Bob! Last chance!
You're running out of time, I'm taking almost all
I'm not giving up yet, Bob! Get serious!
You're almost out of time, take what's left
This is my last stand, Bob! Don't push me to the wall!
You've had your chance, now it's my turn
